content: the tranquility blanket is a free crochet along ** the free crochet along starts on june 3rd 2025 ** > ** the full blanket pdf pattern is already available for purchase > here 1 ** ---------------------------------------- the pattern offers 3 blanket sizes - baby blanket throw and lapghan you can choose which size you want to make the crochet along will take place for 4 weeks the different sections will be released twice a week tuesday & friday and will be available to view for free on the blog the links to all the different parts will be updated on ** the main cal post 2 ** where you can also find the full event details materials needed and yarn quantities 1 https //madebygootie com/springtime-journey-blanket-pattern/ 2 https //madebygootie com/crochet/color-block-crochet-blanket//
